title: Debunking Voting Misinformation About the Midterm Elections
description: Here are some of the main falsehoods and rumors that have spread on social media in the lead-up to Election Day.
dc:creator: Cecilia Kang
media:credit: Rebecca Noble for The New York Times
media:description: Voting misinformation and rumors have been building on social media, including about ballot drop boxes and mail-in voting.
